alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Iron; Price; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 3:29AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Bayfield, Iron, Ashland, northern Price and northeastern Sawyer Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 329 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Barksdale, to 8 miles north of Clam Lake, to 8 miles northeast of Winter, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mellen around 340 AM CDT. Odanah around 345 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Park Falls, Butternut, Upson, Hurley and Gile. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
